Action.author: pandrejko
Action.body: On scrum this morning Dave indicated minimal doc is required here. Just a few additional sentences stating that automatic reconciliation occurs when a peer is added. ....

Action.body: When Manish has finished his work on this he will be collaborating with me on the language.
